thread.title: وزیر مشاور در امور خارجه امارات: اجازه نمیدهیم در معرض خطر برنامه موشکی رژیم ایران باشیم
thread.title_full: وزیر مشاور در امور خارجه امارات: اجازه نمیدهیم در معرض خطر برنامه موشکی رژیم ایران باشیم

posts.author: iranfanouse.blogspot.de (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: وزیر مشاور در امور خارجه امارات: اجازه نمیدهیم در معرض خطر برنامه موشکی رژیم ایران باشیم
posts.text:
لينك به منبع: 

انور قرقاش - امارات 
انور قرقاش وزیر مشاور در امور خارجه امارات با حمله به رژیم ایران گفت: اجازه نمیهیم در معرض خطر برنامه موشکی رژیم ایران باشیم

وی روز دوشنبه 15آبان در حساب توئیتری خود نوشت: «حمله ناکام شبهنظامیان حوثی به ریاض با استفاده از موشکهای بالستیک رژیم ایران، تحولی خطرناک است که باعث بازنگری در ردهبندی اولویتها میشود. مهمترین اولویتها خطر توسعه طلبی رژیم ایران است که چالش نخست است.

انور قرقاش افزود: «خطر تبدیل شبهنظامیان حوثی به حزباللهی دیگر، فرا روی ما قرار دارد، مخالفت شبهنظامیان حوثی با راهحل سیاسی در دورههای گذشته، تأکیدی بر آن است که اکنون زمان نرمش با آنها نیست.

وی افزود: «حمله موشکی بالستیک حوثی-ایرانی به ریاض، باعث میشود پرونده موشکهای بالستیک رژیم ایران، اهمیتی فوری یابد. اجازه نخواهیم داد در معرض خطر این برنامه باشیم.

وزیر مشاور در امور خارجه امارات گفت: «در این زمینه، تقویت موضعگیری یکپارچه کشورهای خلیجفارس در قبال رژیم ایران و مزدور حوثیاش، بسیار حائز اهمیت است. اکنون مکان و زمانی برای مواضع سردرگم و یکجانبه نیست.

posts.author: IDEAL.ES
posts.title: Esta chica revela la brutal transformación de nuestro cupero durante un día
posts.text:
Black Friday Esta chica revela la brutal transformación de nuestro cuerpo durante un día Los cambios que se producen en nuestro cuerpo a lo largo de una misma jornada pueden incluso llevarnos a variar el peso entre 1 y 2 kilos IDEAL.ES Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 12:55 
Muchas personas que se someten a una dieta de adelgazamiento acaban por abandonarla por la frustración que les provoca no pesar lo mismo al pesarse a distintas horas del día. El motivo no es otro que los cambios que se producen en nuestro cuerpo a lo largo de una misma jornada , que pueden incluso llevarnos a variar el peso entre 1 y 2 kilos. 
Para demostrarlo, la bloguera de fitness Lauren Tickner ha compartido en su blog unas imágenes de su cuerpo realizadas a distintas horas del día, para demostrar que la sensación de hinchazón que sentimos en algún momento del día es algo completamente normal y que no hay que preocuparse por ello. 
“Mañana vs tarde. Sólo horas de diferencia. ¡Tener un estómago más lleno después de comer y sin hacer nada más no es algo que deba preocuparnos! ¡Nos pasa a todos!”, dijo la bloguera en Instagram mostrando los cambios de su propio cuerpo. “A no ser que la causa sea por una enfermedad, en tal caso lo que hay que hacer es acudir a la consulta de un médico lo antes posible", aclaró después”, añadió a la publicación. 
Lauren cuenta con más de 115.000 seguidores en la red social, que utiliza para tumbar mitos sobre el cuerpo humano. Una publicación compartida de Lauren Tickner #StrengthFeed (@laurenfitness) el 30 de Oct de 2017 a la(s) 11:46 PDT Temas

thread.title_full: லாரி மீது ஜீப் மோதி பயங்கர விபத்து : 13 பேர் பரிதாப பலி | Terrific jeep collided with a lorry accident: 13 people killed in the tragic - Dinakaran

posts.author: dinakaran.com
posts.title: லாரி மீது ஜீப் மோதி பயங்கர விபத்து : 13 பேர் பரிதாப பலி | Terrific jeep collided with a lorry accident: 13 people killed in the tragic
posts.text:
2017-11-07@ 14:31:30 அகமதாபாத் : குஜராத் மாநிலத்தில் இன்று அதிகாலை லாரி மீது ஜீப் மோதிய பயங்கர விபத்தில் 13 பேர் பரிதாபமாக உயிரிழந்தனர்.குஜராத் மாநிலம் அகமதாபாத்-இந்தூர் நெடுஞ்சாலையில் இன்று அதிகாலை 3 மணியளவில் ஜீப் மீது சரக்கு லாரி மோதி பயங்கர விபத்து ஏற்பட்டது. அகமதாபாத்திலிருந்து மத்தியப்பிரதேசம் மாநிலத்தில் உள்ள தங்கள் சொந்த ஊரான அலிராஜ்பூர் மாவட்டத்திற்கு சுமார் 25 பேர் ஜீப்பில் சென்று கொண்டிருந்தனர். அப்போது முன்னால் சென்றுக்கொண்டிருந்த லாரி மீது ஜீப் மோதியது. 

இதில் ஜீப்பில் பயணம் செய்த 6 பெண்கள் உட்பட 12 பேர் சம்பவ இடத்திலேயே பரிதாபமாக உயிரிழந்தனர். மேலும் 9 பேர் படுகாயமடைந்தனர். அவர்களை அருகில் உள்ள மருத்துவமனைக்கு கொண்டு சென்றனர். அவர்களில் ஒரு குழந்தை சிகிச்சை பலனின்றி உயிரிழந்தது.இந்த விபத்து கேதா மாவட்டம் காத்லால் நகருக்கு அருகில் நிகழ்ந்துள்ளது. இரவு நேரம் என்பதால் டிரைவர் தூக்கத்தில் லாரி மீது மோதியிருக்கலாம் என கூறப்படுகிறது. இதுகுறித்து போலீசார் வழக்குப்பதிவு செய்தி விசாரணை நடத்தி வருகின்றனர்.
Tags: அகமதாபாத் விபத்து நெடுஞ்சாலை லாரி மருத்துவமனை

posts.author: IDEAL.ES
posts.title: Viola a una chica mientras ella pide ayuda a su novio por teléfono
posts.text:
Black Friday Viola a una chica mientras ella pide ayuda a su novio por teléfono "Ella ha sido extremadamente valiente a lo largo de este proceso y la felicito por hacerle frente a su atacante y espero que su sentencia la ayude a seguir adelante" IDEAL.ES Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 10:33 
Terrible suceso el que tuvo lugar en Datchet, Berkshire, Reuno Unido. Un hombre llamado Kapil Dogra, de 35 años, iba de camino a comprar drogas de clase A como la heroína o la cocaína cuando se encontró con una joven que salía de la estación de tren y que iba hablando por teléfono con su novio. 
Según informa Mirror el agresor la agarró fuertemente del brazo y se la llevó al bosque para abusar sexualmente de ella. Antes de que la llamada se cortase, su pareja escuchó el inicio del ataque y ella le dijo que avisase a la policía. 
A pesar de pruebas evidentes de ADN e imágenes de unas cámaras de seguridad, el agresor negó los cargos de los que se le acusaba. Finalmente, el viernes pasado fue condenado a 13 años de prisión 
Un portavoz del Servicio de Fiscalía de la Corona dijo: "Dogra la agarró, puso su mano sobre su boca y amenazó con apuñalarla antes de apagar su teléfono. Luego la arrastró a un área boscosa donde la violó y agredió sexualmente. Dogra fue identificado más tarde por pruebas de ADN y CCTV.” 
La agente de investigación Sara Harrison añadió: "En ningún momento durante el juicio, Dogra mostró ningún remordimiento por la terrible experiencia que le hizo pasar a su víctima. Ella ha sido extremadamente valiente a lo largo de este proceso y la felicito por hacerle frente a su atacante y espero que su sentencia la ayude a seguir adelante”. Temas

thread.title: Benchmark Holdings appoints two to board
thread.title_full: Benchmark Holdings appoints two to board

posts.title: Benchmark Holdings appoints two to board
posts.text: Benchmark Holdings appoints two to board Staff Writer | London, United Kingdom | Tuesday November 7, 2017 | 29 minutes ago Benchmark Holdings, an aquaculture biotechnology and food chain sustainability business, announced the appointment of Hugo Wahnish and Yngve Myhre as non-executive directors. Hugo Wahnish has over 35 years of experience in the animal health and pharmaceuticals industry, firstly with GlaxoSmithKline, and more recently with Merck during a period of major growth in the organisation. Mr. Wahnish held the post of Chief Commercial Officer Animal Health at Merck, having responsibility for Merck's commercial operations worldwide. Since stepping down from that role in 2012, he has acted as an independent senior advisor with several multinational companies, private equity groups and consulting firms primarily in the animal health sector. Yngve Myhre has more than 20 years experience in the aquaculture sector as a senior executive, adviser and investor. Mr. Myhre was chief executive of leading Norwegian salmon producer Salmar, and of international white fish supplier Aker Seafood during periods of successful growth. Mr. Myhre is now chairman of Chilean salmon producer Nova Austral, recently acquired by Cargill, and sits on the boards of Mediterranean fish producer Andromeda and Norwegian aquaculture research institute Nofima. He also acts as strategic adviser to investors in the aquaculture sector. He has a very strong track record in Benchmark's focus area of aquaculture, both in the Norwegian and international markets. ■ LATEST MOVES FROM United Kingdom

thread.title: Tư vấn tiết kiệm chi phí tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini
thread.title_full: Tư vấn tiết kiệm chi phí tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini

posts.author: Chuyenkhoxuong (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Tư vấn tiết kiệm chi phí tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini
posts.text:
TƯ VẤN TIẾT KIỆM TỐI ĐA CHI PHÍ KHI MỞ SIÊU THỊ MINI 

Với lợi thế có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tham vấn setup siêu thị cho nhiều hệ thống siêu thị tổng hợp, siêu thị mini, siêu thị thuận lợi, siêu thị điện máy, các cửa hàng tạp hóa, …. hôm nay công ty TPP xin san sớt với quý doanh nghiệp, cá nhân chủ nghĩa đang có ý định mở siêu thị về những lưu ý giúp tiện tặn tối đa uổng khi mở siêu thị mini. Đừng bỏ qua bài viết này, kiên cố chúng sẽ hữu ích với bạn.
SETUP SIÊU THỊ CẦN GÌ? 

Bất cứ ai khi bắt đầu kinh doanh bán sỉ nói chung và siêu thị nói riêng đều có một thắc mắc giống nhau đó là cần những gì khi bắt đầu mở siêu thị/cửa hàng?
  
Sau đây là một số vấn đề cấp thiết phải thực hiện trước khi bắt tay vào setup hệ thống siêu thị của bạn:
Tìm mặt bằng: Mặt dù khi chọn mặt bằng còn phụ thuộc rất nhiều vào nhân tố vốn mà bạn đang có. Thế nhưng công ty TPP khuyên bạn nên ở gần những khu dân cư, có chỗ đỗ xe ô tô và xe máy, tránh nằm quá sâu trong các con hẻm nhỏ, khu dân cư loáng thoáng.
Trang thiết bị bán hàng: Khi mở cửa hàng, siêu thị chắc chắn bạn phải cần những trang thiết bị bán hàng như: Máy in hóa đơn, máy in mã vạch, máy tính tiền, phần mềm quản lý bán hàng, sổ sách biên chép, các thiết bị an ninh (cổng từ, camera quan sát),…

Những nguồn cung cấp hàng hóa: Trước khi mở siêu thị bạn phải kiếm được nguồn hàng, phải có đủ thông báo về giá cả trước để so sánh. Đừng quên khảo sát giá cả của các siêu thị phụ cận để tham khảo về giá cả họ bán và đồng thời đưa ra được mức giá hợp cho siêu thị của mình.

Nhân sự: đương nhiên không thể thiếu việc chuẩn bị nhân sự phục vụ cho siêu thị của bạn như: viên chức bán hàng, viên chức thu ngân, nhân viên coi sóc khách hàng, nhân viên giữ xe, bảo vệ,…
MỞ SIÊU THỊ MINI CẦN BAO NHIÊU VỐN?
Đây chính là câu hỏi mà công ty TPP nhận được nhiều nhất kể từ khi cung cấp dịch vụ tư vấn setup siêu thị đến nay. Theo kinh nghiệm của chúng tôi thì quý khách hàng cần bỏ ra ít nhất là triệu khikinh doanh siêu thị mini.
Tiền mặt bằng khoảng 150m2 + xây dựng và trang hoàng là: 150m2 x 650.000 = 97.500.000 đồng
30 triệu đồng chi cho việc mua kệ siêu thị.
15 triệu cho máy tính tiền và lương tối thiểu 5 nhân viên chỉ dẫn cho khách hàng
Các xài khác
Tóm lại: Chỉ cần khoảng 200 triệu đồng là bạn đủ để kinh dinh cho một siêu thị mini rồi.
 
XÁC ĐỊNH ĐẦU RA CỦA HÀNG HOÁ 
Căn cứ vào thu nhập và nhu cầu của người dân xung quanh khu vực siêu thị của bạn mà có thể bán những mặt hàng phù hợp. Điều quan trọng nhất trong việc chọn lọc hàng hóa đó chính là giá phải rẻ hơn đối thủ cạnh tranh, nhiều sản phẩm mới, chất lượng cao để cuộn khách hàng.
XÁC ĐỊNH ĐỐI TƯỢNG SẼ BÁN CHỦ YẾU 
Phải xác định được đối tượng mua hàng của bạn là ai vị điều này rất quan yếu trong việc xác định được nhóm hàng chính yếu bạn sẽ bán.
Tỉ dụ: Nếu bạn bán cho công nhân nên chọn lựa những nhóm hàng tiêu dùng cần yếu dành cho công nhân, bán hàng tiêu dùng cho người dân và hộ gia đình thì chọn những mặt hàng cần thiết hàng ngày cho các hộ gia đình,…
SẮM CÁC TRANG THIẾT BỊ CẦN THIẾT 
Những thiết bị cấp thiết cho một siêu thị mini bao gồm: Giá kệ siêu thị, bàn thu ngân, tủ đông – tủ mát, camera an ninh, cổng từ, thiết bị quản lý bán hàng: Máy in, máy máy đọc mã vạch, máy tính tiền,…
Bàn thu ngân: Có thể chọn bàn gỗ ép để tiết kiệmvới mức giá tầm 500.000đ – 800.000đ/ cái tùy thiết kế. Nếu bạn chọn bàn thu ngân gỗ MDF, măt inox thì giá chừng 3.,5 triệu/ bàn dài 1,8m. Những sản phẩm bàn thu ngân chuyên dụng trong siêu thị lớn có giá khoảng 6 -7 triệu đồng/cái.

Tủ đông – tủ mát: Theo kinh nghiệm nhiều năm cung cấp dịch vụ tham vấn setup siêu thị của TPP thì bạn nên chọn tủ mát của cocacola, vinamilk hoặc THtrue milk,… Để xin được tủ này cần giấy phép đăng ký kinh doanh, hộ khẩu hoặc chứng minh thư quần chúng. Nên xin tủ của cocacola bởi thương hiệu này dễ xin hơn, chỉ sau khoảng 15 ngày là đã có tủ. Đặc biệt, mỗi tháng nhà cung cấp còn hỗ trợ chừng khoảng 200k tiền điện được quy đổi ra hàng hóa.
Tủ để đồ: Nên trang bị tủ để đồ vì khách không thể mang theo túi xách vào siêu thị của bạn được. Một chiếc tủ chừng 12 ngăn là có lí cho một siêu thị mini, giá của nó chừng 2,4 triệu/tủ.
Thiết bị an ninh: Để đảm bảo an toàn, tránh thất thoát hàng hóa thì bạn khăng khăng phải lắp đặt các thiết bị an ninh như camera quan sát, cổng từ an ninh,…
Thiết bị bán hàng: Những thiết bị này là chẳng thể thiếu. Hàng hóa trong siêu thị gồm rất nhiều mặt hàng, khó nhớ vô cùng do đó phần mềm quản lý bán hàng sẽ giúp bạn giải quyết những khó khăn này.
Trên đây là những lưu ý để có thể tùng tiệm tối đa phí khi mở siêu thị mini, công ty TPP hy vọng bạn sẽ có khởi đầu kinh dinh phát đạt cùng siêu thị mini của mình.
Quý khách hàng có nhu cầu tham vấn, setup siêu thị hoặc các dịch vụ kế toán, đào tạo nhân viên,…vui lòng can hệ ngay với TPP để được hỗ trợ mau chóng, tiết kiệm.

posts.text:
Close Image 1 of 8 In this Monday, Nov. 6, 2017 photo, a street vendor stands in front of a poster of outgoing Prime Minister Saad Hariri that hangs on a street in Beirut, Lebanon. The abrupt resignation of Hariri was bizarre even by the often twisted standards of Lebanese politics: Saad Hariri made the announcement from the Saudi capital in a pre-recorded message on a Saudi-owned station. Stunned Lebanese are convinced Saudi Arabia, Hariri's longtime ally, forced him to take the step, which effectively wrecks the prime minister's delicate compromise government with Saudi nemesis and Iran ally Hezbollah. The abrupt resignation of Hariri was bizarre even by the often twisted standards of Lebanese politics: Saad Hariri made the announcement from the Saudi capital in a pre-recorded message on a Saudi-owned station. (Saudi Press Agency, via AP, File) less FILE - In this Monday, Nov. 6, 2017 file photo, provided by the Saudi Press Agency, Saudi King Salman, right, shakes hands with outgoing Lebanese Prime Minister Saad Hariri in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The abrupt ... more Photo: AP Lebanese fear PM's resignation was a Saudi power play 1 / 8 Back to Gallery 
BEIRUT (AP) — Stunned Lebanese fear that Prime Minister Saad Hariri's surprise resignation last weekend — announced from Saudi Arabia in a pre-recorded message — was a power play by the kingdom aimed at wrecking a delicate compromise with Hezbollah and taking a swipe at regional rival Iran. 
The move has thrown Lebanon into turmoil, potentially dragging the small nation back into the regional fight for supremacy between Saudi Arabia and Iran — at a time when Iran and its allies are seen to have won the proxy war against Saudi-backed forces in neighboring Syria. 
Sunni-led Saudi Arabia, under Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, has been intensifying its confrontation with Shiite powerhouse Iran. The two camps support rival sides in countries across the region, worsening conflicts in Yemen, Syria and elsewhere. 
Each also has proxies in Lebanon, but in recent years, Lebanese parties have tried — largely successfully —to prevent those tensions from blowing up into full-scale violence in a country still haunted by memories from its own 1975-1990 civil war. Shiite Hezbollah dominates Lebanon, but it has sought not to provoke the Sunni community, which in turn has avoided crossing the guerrilla force. 
The fear among some Lebanese now is that Saudi Arabia will upset that balance, trying to compensate for its losses in proxy wars elsewhere. 
In Syria, Hezbollah and other Iranian-backed fighters allied with President Bashar Assad's forces have recaptured large areas and are working to secure a much-prized land corridor stretching from Tehran to the Mediterranean through Iraq, Syria and Lebanon. By contrast, Saudi Arabia has been stuck in a fruitless war in Yemen against Iranian-backed Shiite rebels, and a Saudi bid to isolate Qatar has failed to achieve its goals. 
Saudi fingerprints were seen all over Hariri's resignation on Saturday. 
Hariri appeared on Saudi-owned Al-Arabiya TV in a recorded video from an undisclosed location, haltingly delivering a statement in which he accused Iran of meddling in Arab affairs and the Iran-backed Hezbollah of holding Lebanon hostage. 
"Iran's arms in the region will be cut off," he said, adding that he felt compelled to resign and that his life was endangered. 
The resignation came exactly a year after Hariri formed a coalition government that included Hezbollah, shortly after Michel Aoun, a Maronite Christian and Hezbollah ally, was elected president. That arrangement was the product of a rare understanding between Saudi Arabia and Iran for calm in Lebanon, ending a two-year period during which the presidency was vacant. 
It has been an uneasy partnership between Hariri and Hezbollah. As the Shiite militia and its allies advanced in Syria, Hariri came under pressure from Washington and Riyadh to distance himself from the group. In recent days, Lebanese government ministers have bickered publicly over sending an ambassador to Damascus and repatriation plans for hundreds of thousands of Syrian refugees living in Lebanon. 
Still, officials had denied the tensions threatened the unity government. 
Last week, Saudi Minister for Gulf Affairs Thamer al-Sabhan predicted on Lebanon's MTV station that "astonishing developments" were coming for Lebanon. 
After Hariri's resignation, rumors spread in Lebanon that he was under house arrest in Saudi Arabia — especially after news broke over the weekend of arrests in the kingdom of dozens of Saudi princes, ministers and influential businessmen in a sweep purportedly over corruption. 
Hezbollah's leader, Hassan Nasrallah, on Sunday accused Saudi Arabia of drafting Hariri's resignation letter and forcing him to read it on Saudi TV. He even asked whether Hariri was being held against his will. 
The daily Al-Akhbar, a harsh critic of Saudi Arabia's policies, ran a full-page photo of Hariri on its front page with the words: "The hostage." 
Speculation continued to swirl despite the official Saudi Press Agency carrying photos Monday showing Hariri meeting with Saudi King Salman. Hariri tweeted that he was "honored to visit" the king in his office — and some of his supporters tweeted back, telling him to take a selfie raising his left hand as a signal that he's OK. 
Hariri, a dual Saudi-Lebanese citizen, has faced financial difficulties recently as his business in Saudi Arabia suffers. Earlier this year he closed his family's Oger construction firm, which had made billions of dollars since his late father founded it in the 1970s. 
Hilal Khashan, a political science professor at the American University of Beirut, said Hariri made "many concessions" to his political rivals in order to become prime minister and would not have given up the position had it not been for Saudi pressure. 
Joseph Bahout, a visiting scholar at Carnegie's Middle East Program, warned just last month that Saudi Arabia was seeking ways to compensate for the loss of Syria as a place where it could bleed Iran. 
"A renewed desire to reverse their regional fortunes could lead them to try regaining a foothold in Lebanon," he wrote. 
Saudi officials have vowed to crush Hezbollah and recently have been inciting Lebanese to rise up against the Shiite militant group. Saudi Arabia, which along with Western nations considers Hezbollah a terrorist organization, says the group should not be part of a future Lebanese government. 
Hezbollah's leader has been one of the kingdom's harshest critics, and it is not uncommon for Hezbollah supporters to chant "Death to Al Saud" at their rallies — a reference to the Saudi royal family. 
At the very least, Hariri's resignation could mean another long period without a government for Lebanon, at a time when its economy is struggling under a public debt that has reached more than $75 billion — 140 percent of its gross domestic product, a debt-to-GDP ratio that is among the highest in the world. 
According to Lebanon's power-sharing deal, the president should be a Maronite Christian, the prime minister a Sunni and the parliament speaker a Shiite. But given Hariri's wide support among Sunnis, it may be difficult for any Sunni politician to assume the post of prime minister without alienating the Sunni community. And it will be impossible to form a Cabinet without Hezbollah, since the militant group and its allies enjoy wide support among both Shiites and Christians. Most Popular

posts.title: Facts On Renting School Bus Services Washington DC
posts.text:
By Deborah Murray 

Sometimes people want to travel in large numbers together, and that cannot be helped by the size of their cars. As such, this leads them to rent school bus services Washington Dc . It is something that has gained popularity recently, and everyone is getting a piece. Many factors can explain this phenomenon, but it is because many people feel safe and comfortable when being carried here other than when using public means. Below are some ideas that will help you to get the right auto if you are in need some time.

The rentals will come in various sizes and hence the need to get the value that you need. This means you need to ensure you are aware of how many people are going to drive you. When you are aware of the number, then you can determine the size of the car that you are going to get.

One of the obvious mistakes you can make is picking a huge truck which you expect to accommodate everyone only to find out it was too big or too small according to the number of travelers. The problem is that it is going to leave a lot of spaces unoccupied, but you will still have to pay for it. You are going to lose cash that you can save if you decide to take some time and be more precise with the numbers.

If you can get the facts about the mileage of where you are going, then it becomes better for you. Always strive to use the shortest route possible. That will mean the distance becomes shortened and hence the price you pay is manageable. Another way will be to pick and drop everyone at the same point other than choosing to pick each from their private places. When you give this fact to any management, they will consider reducing the charges significantly.

Assign someone to have the car cleaned before returning it, it will be in the best condition. It is not right to replace it with trash. Let the travelers not to eat or drink form the bus. Return the auto in the same condition it was when the keys were handed to you. That will mean the next time you come asking for one they will consider you.

In case you are with kids then the responsibility doubles. In fact, it is not just about kids, but the size of the kids and age will matter a lot. When they can take instructions, it means you need to have some adults looking after them throughout the whole journey.

In case you need for information for the same there are many sources such as the internet for greater understanding of the hired school bus. This will include on possible areas for renting one within your location. It is one of the most accepted means of research in the modern world, and you have to accept it too.

These are some of the fundamental points that one has to have at their fingertips. Some aspects have not been discussed, but this will serve to lead you through every obstacle that you encounter. Everything boils down to planning and how you execute the mission.




About the Author:

Find a summary of the benefits of using school bus services Washington DC area and more info about a reliable bus company at http://www.dbusman.com today.

thread.title: La misteriosa 'resurreción' del exnovio de Olivia Newton 9 años después de ser dado por muerto
thread.title_full: La misteriosa 'resurreción' del exnovio de Olivia Newton 9 años después de ser dado por muerto | Ideal

posts.author: IDEAL.ES
posts.title: La misteriosa 'resurreción' del exnovio de Olivia Newton 9 años después de ser dado por muerto
posts.text:
El que fuese novio de Olivia Newton John, y que fuese declarado por fallecido en extrañas circunstancias, Patrick McDermott, podría haber resucitado. Más bien podría seguir vivo. En 2008 se declaró su defunción tras su desaparición en 2005 durante un viaje en barco. La Guardia Costera de Estados Unidos dijo que probablemente se hubiese ahogado. Pero un investigador privado afirma haberlo encontrado . McDermott se encontraba en una embarcación para pescar en la costa californiana con otra veintena de personas. Ninguno de ellos le vio caer al agua. Cinco años después se filtraron rumores que apuntaban a un fingimiento de su muerte y que se encontraba viviendo en México. Los últimos hallazgos apuntan a ello.
Una noticia que se desconoce la repercusión que tendrá en la propia Olivia Newton John, que recientemente ha revelado los fuertes dolores que padece tras serle diagnosticado un nuevo cáncer . La revista australiana ‘New Idea’ asegura tener una evidencia fotográfica de que su expareja está viva.
La fotografía supuestamente habría llegado a través de la agencia de medios norteamericana Coleman Rayner. En ella se aprecia a una persona que coincide con la descripción del desaparecido. Tendría unos 60 años, “los ojos son muy similares y los oídos se extienden hacia abajo en la cabeza a la misma distancia”, aseguran. Una resurrección, o una farsa que tocó a su fin.

thread.title: NBA: Irving mène Boston à sa 9e victoire consécutive
thread.title_full: NBA: Irving mène Boston à sa 9e victoire consécutive - L'Express

posts.author: lexpress.fr
posts.title: NBA: Irving mène Boston à sa 9e victoire consécutive
posts.text:
San Francisco - Kyrie Irving a dépassé la barre des 30 points pour la première fois depuis son arrivée à Boston cet été, inscrivant 35 points pour conduire les Celtics à leur neuvième victoire consécutive, lundi à Atlanta (110-107). Boston, qui est en tête de la Conférence Est (9 victoires - 2 défaites), a eu du mal à se débarrasser d'Atlanta, qui était allé battre Cleveland la veille. Les Hawks, derniers à l'Est, étaient encore à hauteur des Celtics à 1 minute 37 secondes de la sirène quand un panier à 3 points d'Irving a permis aux Celtics de prendre les devants pour de bon. 
Il y avait eu auparavant pas moins de 25 changements de leader dans ce match particulièrement indécis. 
Jayson Tatum a également apporté sa contribution avec 21 points pour Boston. 
Par ailleurs, Golden State a enchaîné son quatrième succès de rang malgré une adresse déplorable (36,8% au tir): les Warriors ont battu Miami 97-80. 
Kevin Durant a inscrit 21 points et pris 8 rebonds tandis que Draymond Green a marqué 21 points et capté 9 rebonds. 
Stephen Curry a en revanche connu une soirée mitigée au regard de ses standards habituels, ne rentrant que deux paniers à 3 points sur neuf tentatives pour un total de 16 points. 
Grâce à ce succès, Golden State a rejoint Houston en tête de la Conférence Ouest, avec un bilan de 8 victoires et 3 défaites. 
+ Plus d'actualité :
Crise en Catalogne: entre grèves et manifestations, la région tourne au ralenti Nucléaire: Hulot recule-t-il dans la bonne direction? Révolution bolchevique: Poutine veut-il faire table rase de l'URSS? Bousculée lors du procès Merah, Latifa Ibn Ziaten dépose plainte

thread.title: Toyota profit rises on sales growth, cheap yen, cost cuts
thread.title_full: Toyota profit rises on sales growth, cheap yen, cost cuts

posts.author: Yuri Kageyama
posts.title: Toyota profit rises on sales growth, cheap yen, cost cuts
posts.text:
Toyota profit rises on sales growth, cheap yen, cost cuts By Yuri Kageyama ,   7th, 2017 @ 12:37am  3 photos  
TOKYO (AP) — Toyota Motor Corp. reported Tuesday that it saw a 16 percent gain in fiscal second quarter profit as sales grew and a cheaper yen offset higher marketing costs. 
Toyota, Japan's top automaker, said its July-September profit totaled 458.2 billion yen ($4 billion), up from 393.7 billion yen the same period last year. Quarterly sales grew 10 percent to 7.14 trillion yen ($62.7 billion). 
Toyota, which makes the Camry sedan, Lexus luxury models and Prius hybrid, raised its annual profit forecast through March 2018, to 1.95 trillion yen ($17 billion) from the earlier 1.75 trillion yen ($15 billion). 
That would be up 6 percent from 1.83 trillion yen it racked up the previous fiscal year. 
Toyota is crediting cost cuts and a cheaper yen, which helps lift earnings for Japanese exporters. 
Toyota said it is expecting an exchange rate of 111 yen to the dollar this fiscal year, up from 108 yen the previous fiscal year. 
The effects of foreign exchange rates added 135 billion yen ($1.2 billion) to quarterly operating profit, while cost reduction efforts added another 50 billion yen ($439 million). That was enough to offset marketing costs at 130 billion yen ($1.1 billion) for the quarter. 
Toyota said it now expects to sell 8.95 million vehicles for the fiscal year, up from an earlier projection for 8.9 million vehicles. That would still fall short of the 8.97 million vehicles sold the previous fiscal year. 
Toyota's RAV4 sport-utility vehicle and Camry sedan were selling well in the U.S. market, while its hybrid models continued to be popular in Japan. 
Toyota is planning to build a new plant in the U.S., which will be run with another Japanese automaker Mazda Motor Corp., although its site has not yet been announced. 
The plan comes at a time when Japan is facing pressure from President Donald Trump's administration to reduce the bilateral trade imbalance and move production to the U.S. and create jobs there. 
Trump is now visiting Asia, and he left Japan and arrived in South Korea on Tuesday. 
___ 
Yuri Kageyama can be reached at https://twitter.com/yurikageyama 
Her work can be found at https://www.apnews.com/search/yuri%20kageyama

thread.title: Disease identification app to boost food security in Africa
thread.title_full: Disease identification app to boost food security in Africa

posts.title: Disease identification app to boost food security in Africa
posts.text: Africa Small-scale farmers in Africa Disease identification app to boost food security in Africa Staff Writer | Tuesday November 7, 2017 | 31 minutes ago A team of researchers that has developed an app which will allow small-scale farmers in Africa to identify cassava diseases has won a $100,000 grant to expand the tool for use on other root, tuber and banana crops. The international team comprises scientists from the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) in Nigeria, Pennsylvania State University in the US, the International Centre for Tropical Agriculture in Colombia, the International Potato Centre in Peru, and Bioversity International, headquartered in Italy. Article continues below The grant forms part of the Consultative Group on International Agricultural Research (CGIAR) Platform for Big Data Agriculture ‘Inspire Challenges’ programme. It was presented at the Big Data in Agriculture Convention held recently in Colombia. According to IITA’s James Legg, one of the leaders of the project, the team generated more than 200 000 images of diseased cassava crops in coastal Tanzania and farms in western Kenya, in order to develop an artificial intelligence algorithm that can automatically classify five cassava diseases. The app is being field-tested in Tanzania. ■ What to read next

posts.text: martes, 7   GOBERNADOR FRANCISCO VEGA ENTREGA UNIFORMES ESCOLARES EN BENEFICIO DE MÁS DE 24 MIL ALUMNOS DE TIJUANA. En el caso de Tijuana se benefició a estudiantes de educación básica con una inversión de 9 millones 180 mil pesos TIJUANA, B.C.- Lunes 6   .- Con el fin de atender las necesidades de alumnos de educación básica del ciclo escolar 2017-2018 y contribuir a la economía familiar, el Gobernador Francisco “Kiko” Vega de Lamadrid encabezó la entrega simbólica de 24 mil 325 uniformes para estudiantes de Tijuana, como parte del programa que contempla el otorgamiento de 83 mil 292 uniformes en 484 escuelas de la entidad, lo que en conjunto representa una inversión de 31 millones 434 mil 400 pesos. Durante el evento realizado en la primaria de educación indígena “Ve Saa Kua a”, el Mandatario estatal expresó que esta escuela se encuentra ubicada en una comunidad muy representativa de Tijuana y Baja California, zona donde se ubican colonias en las que radican importantes grupos de origen indígena, que son la raíz de la nación mexicana y a quienes se debe atender con educación inclusiva, de calidad y equitativa. Señaló que en la entidad, uno de cada tres habitantes estudia en alguno de los 4 mil 500 planteles escolares en operación en el estado, mientras que a nivel estatal hay más de 983 mil alumnos que cursan estudios desde preescolar a postgrado, al recordar que en Baja California se busca que la educación sea la mejor, por lo que ésta es universal, gratuita y obligatoria desde preescolar a educación media superior, a partir de enero de 2014. Vega de Lamadrid mencionó que la entrega de uniformes a nivel estatal para el ciclo 2017-2018 significa una inversión total de 31 millones 434 mil 400 pesos y este recurso tan importante surge del esfuerzo de todos los bajacalifornianos que con su trabajo diario hacen posible que el gobierno cuente con recursos para orientarlos de una manera muy responsable, tal y como sucede con la entrega de uniformes, además de representar un apoyo para la economía de las familias. El Secretario de Educación y Bienestar Social, Miguel Ángel Mendoza González, informó que con la entrega de estos uniformes se procura cumplir con las acciones de equidad educativa para alumnas y alumnos y se ayuda a las familias en su economía, apoyo que surge del artículo 15 de Ley de Educación del Estado y que se centra en los estudiantes que más lo requieren. Explicó que en Tijuana serán entregados 24 mil 325 uniformes, en Mexicali 16 mil 073, en Tecate 9 mil 762, en Ensenada 26 mil 164 y en Playas de Rosarito un total de 6 mil 968, los cuales serán distribuidos en 484 escuelas de la entidad de los niveles de preescolar, primaria y secundaria. El funcionario estatal resaltó que Baja California es una entidad en donde todos sus habitantes tienen la oportunidad de estudiar, ya que la educación es gratuita desde preescolar a preparatoria y con la entrega de uniformes se brinda ayuda a la economía familiar, además de que se actúa en el marco de la Cruzada por la Seguridad para favorecer que niños y jóvenes sigan en las aulas y se logre una mayor retención de alumnos en las escuelas, porque con más años de estudio existen mayores oportunidades de trabajo, lo que contribuye a construir una sociedad más segura. En representación de las alumnas y alumnos de la escuela “Ve Saa Kua a”, la niña Idania Rivera Ángel, agradeció al Gobernador Francisco Vega de Lamadrid por el apoyo brindado con la entrega de uniformes, así como a la comunidad escolar en su conjunto. Firma Gobernador Francisco Vega convenio en beneficio de atletas de Baja California Como parte de la agenda de trabajo, el Gobernador Francisco Vega de Lamadrid firmó un convenio de colaboración con la Universidad Autónoma de Nuevo León (UANL), al mencionar que en Baja California y Nuevo León se promueve el deporte y cultura física en todas las disciplinas y todos los niveles, como parte de un extraordinario esfuerzo público y social a favor del deporte, por lo que la firma del acuerdo representa un paso muy importante para las personas, grupos e instituciones dedicadas al deporte, además de que permitirá apuntalar logros y resolver los pendientes como es el relativo al deterioro de la familia, pues con estas acciones se revierte esa inercia. El Director del Instituto del Deporte y Cultura Física de Baja California, Saúl Castro Verdugo, indicó que el convenio beneficiará a atletas, entrenadores y profesionistas de las diferentes áreas del instituto con el propósito de brindarles mejores oportunidades de formación profesional en el terreno académico, además de que podrán estudiar una carrera a distancia o de manera presencial en la UANL. Por su parte, el Rector de la UANL, Rogelio Garza Rivera, expresó que la firma del convenio es de gran importancia porque conjunta los esfuerzos entre gobierno y academia como una alternativa de solución a los problemas sociales, a fin de coadyuvar en la formulación de políticas públicas que mejoren la calidad de vida de la sociedad.

thread.title: 上市公司"新宠":3714亿排队候审 可转债热潮袭来_业内动态_证券频道首页_财经网
thread.title_full: 上市公司"新宠":3714亿排队候审 可转债热潮袭来_业内动态_证券频道首页_财经网 - CAIJING.COM.CN

posts.author: 每经网
posts.title: 上市公司"新宠":3714亿排队候审 可转债热潮袭来_业内动态_证券频道首页_财经网
posts.text:
自从雨虹转债成功发行之后，可转债的发行速度开始明显加快，近期有金禾转债、小康转债、时达转债等发行申购。此外在11月3日发审委集中通过了铁汉生态等四家公司的可转债审核，11月6日蒙草生态等6家公司的发行可转债集体上会，可转债发行出现井喷现象。
据东方财富数据显示，截至11月6日，已获证监会发审委批准通过的可转债共有16只，总发行规模233亿元，另外共有143只可转债预案登记在册，总规模超3714亿元。
可转债发行现加速趋势
2017年9月8日，证监会发布新的证券发行与承销管理办法，将可转债的资金申购方式改为信用申购方式，参与网上申购的投资者申购时无需预缴申购资金，待确认获得配售后，再按实际获配金额缴款；参与网下申购的投资者申购时也无需预缴申购资金。这一新规将可转债的申购门槛放低，所有的A股股票账户均可以参与可转债打新，这使得可转债迅速受到投资者的瞩目。
自从雨虹转债按照新规以信用申购的方式成功发行之后，上市公司发行可转债的热情被点燃，可转债的发行速度开始明显加快。近日有林洋转债、金禾转债、隆基转债、小康转债、时达转债5单发行申购。同时据证监会公告显示，11月6日，发审委还审核5家公司的可转债申请，分别是内蒙华电、吉视传媒、中航电子、蒙草生态和万达信息。
而上市公司申请发行可转债的审核也在加速，甚至出现了一天时间内审核通过了多家上市公司发行可转债申请。据证监会信息显示，仅在10月27日，就有4家公司的可转债发行申请获得通过，包括崇达技术、双环传动、雪迪龙、天康生物等上市公司。此外，在11月3日证监会发审委集中审核通过了包括铁汉生态、道氏技术、海利得、玲珑轮胎等上市公司在内的可转债申请。
截至11月2日，证监会数据显示，发审委已经审核了30家公司的可转债申请，而在2016年全年仅有11家上市公司发行可转债。对此有业内人士认为，当前监管层鼓励发行可转债产品，发审效率和过会率较高，从目前来看，已经上发审会审核的上市公司可转债申请均获得了通过，而且绝大多数是“无条件通过”，仅有少数是“有条件通过”。
或成定增融资替代品
《每日经济新闻》记者注意到，近期林洋能源发行30亿元可转债，金禾实业发行6亿元金禾转债，隆基股份发行28亿元可转债。而在11月6日申购的小康转债与时达转债规模达到23.83亿元。从目前的情况看，可转债若是以此速度审核发行，对市场资金造成的压力将不亚于IPO。而从IPO方面看，目前维持在每周8家左右的发行速度，融资额约在40亿元至70亿元之间。
2017年以来可转债预案频频出台，审批加速是当前可转债市场大幅扩容的重要因素。据证监会数据显示，在证监会审核队列里的可转债企业数达84家，已经通过发审委审核的过会家数有15家，已反馈的有50家，已受理的公司有19家。对此有私募人士向《每日经济新闻》记者指出，随着信用申购赚钱效应的扩散，不少上市公司看到可转债潜在优势，可能很快就会加入进来，往后看规模还在持续扩张。
据东方财富数据显示，今年9月以来截至11月6日，合计34家上市公司出台了可转债的预案，而发行规模则高达1045亿元。此外截至11月6日，已获证监会发审委批准通过的可转债共有16只，总发行规模233亿元，另外共有143只可转债预案登记在册，总规模超3714亿元。
对此有私募人士指出，上市公司发行可转债提速，与再融资新规和减持新规有密切关系。根据再融资新规，定增从发行到退出均受到很大的限制，而发行可转债、优先股和创业板小额快速融资却不受此限制，从而间接地推动上市公司发行可转债的需求。这类低息融资工具受到上市公司青睐，有望成为定增融资的“替代品”。

thread.title: (USA-MD-Waldorf) Mechanic
thread.title_full: (USA-MD-Waldorf) Mechanic

posts.title: (USA-MD-Waldorf) Mechanic
posts.text:
Pep Boys Mechanic in Waldorf , Maryland 
##Job Description 
Overview 
Auto Plus is a major U.S.-based distributor of automotive aftermarket parts. Since 1921, Pep Boys has been one of the nation's leading automotive aftermarket chains with over 7,500 service bays in over 800 locations in 35 states and Puerto Rico. Together, the united organization, Auto Plus Pep Boys, has over 21,000 associates in more than 20 distribution centers and over 1,000 corporate locations. In addition, the company supports more than 530 independently-owned stores and over 2,400 independently-owned service centers across the nation. Auto Plus Pep Boys is owned by Icahn Enterprises L.P. ("Icahn Enterprises"; NASDAQ: IEP). 
Position Summary 
Responsible for the efficient diagnosis, repair, and preventive maintenance of vehicles along with replacement of general automotive parts and accessories. Partner with store management and the desk team to deliver superior service and education to customers on problems and proposed solutions for their vehicles. 
Duties & Responsibilities Ensure a thorough safety and mechanical vehicle inspection is completed and documented in the work order system for every car assigned to him/her that comes into the shop. Ability to communicate repairs that are necessary for the safety and operational efficiency of the vehicle to customers and management. Recommends additional repairs and services pertaining to scheduled maintenance, vehicle enhancements, and/or upgrades as appropriate. Adheres to MAP (UICS) standards. Conduct a wide variety of diagnoses and repairs; including but not limited to brakes, all tire related services, including mounting, balancing, and flat repairs, state safety and emissions testing (where required), fluid changes, steering and suspension, maintenance services, starting and charging. Responsible for securing vehicle during repairs and after repairs are completed. Maintain technical capabilities to ensure proficient, safe use of service equipment. Interprets and applies technical instructions in diagram and text form. Maintain company directed productivity, training development plan, and comeback performance levels. Approachable and knowledgeable resource regarding technical matters related to installation and proper application of parts and accessories, while also providing accurate and effective direction, advice and assistance to service advisors, other technicians, commercial, retail and parts associates, management, and customers. Partner with Management to produce a safe and healthy work environment that complies with all local, state, and federal laws, as well as with company policies and procedures. Expected to comply with loss prevention, safety, and environmental codes and ordinances. 
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities Successful completion of Background and Drug tests. Minimum six months of related experience in the automotive service environment. Must have basic knowledge and understanding of mathematical concepts such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, percentages, and fractions. Ability to apply mathematical formulas to calculate commissions and discounts. ASEs preferred; ASE G1-Auto Maintenance and Light Repair strongly preferred; state certifications/licenses where required. Strong customer service skills. Ability to work Days, Nights, Holidays and Weekends. 
Physical Demands/Work Environment** 
The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. 
The characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. 
Physical Demands Must be able to lift, carry, and place merchandise and supplies up to 50 pounds without assistance. Frequent standing and walking for long periods of time. Frequent reaching overhead and below the knees, squatting, bending, stooping, kneeling, twisting. Possesses fine motor skills to safely operate tools. Climb up and down ladders to retrieve merchandise. Communicate effectively in person, by telephone, or by using telecommunications equipment. Enters and locates information on computer. Visually verifies information, often in small print. Safely operates a motor vehicle. 
Reporting: Store Manager of Service 
Potential Schedule: Days, Nights, Weekend, Holidays 
Type of Store: Supercenter

thread.title: Satrupa to play her trump card in Star Plus’ Rishton Ka Chakravyuh
thread.title_full: Satrupa to play her trump card in Star Plus’ Rishton Ka Chakravyuh

posts.author: KingKhan Hing (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Satrupa to play her trump card in Star Plus’ Rishton Ka Chakravyuh
posts.text: Star Plus’ Rishton Ka Chakravyuh (Rolling Pictures and Taurus Media) has been keeping viewers entertained with the high dose of drama in Laal Mahal post the entry of Sudha (Sangeeta Ghosh) into the house. Being in the house, Sudha is trying to play her game tactfully, even while she pretends before Anami (Mahima Makwana) to be a woman buried in sorrow. Anami’s closeness with Sudha has started to trouble Satrupa (Narayani Shastri) and she is trying to tell her indirectly about Sudha’s true color. Now the game will get rather more interesting with Satrupa playing a trump card to win the confidence of Anami!! Yes, however only time will tell whether Satrupa’s move is indeed good or not. As per a credible source, “Satrupa will play a master game by bringing Anami’s little brother Ladoo (Devyansh Tapuria) to Laal Mahal.” As we know, Anami shares a very close bonding with her brother Lakshya aka Ladoo and she has also been longing to be with her family. Satrupa will plan this move thinking that Anami will be very much moved by her gesture!! And certainly, this move will come as a shocker for Anami. However, will Satrupa be able to win over the confidence of Anami? We buzzed the artists, but could not get through to them. Watch this space for more updates.

thread.title: Brits abandon shops
thread.title_full: Brits abandon shops

posts.title: Brits abandon shops
posts.text:
By The Trader Data overnight from the British Retail Consortium showed that last month retail sales fell at their fastest rate since October 2008. Like-for-like overall sales fell by 1 per cent, versus increasing by 1.7 per cent this time last year. Food sales climbed by 2.4 per cent, non-food collapsing by 2.9 per cent ringing alarm bells for sales this Christmas. Separate data from Barclaycard showed that spending grew by less than inflation (2.4 per cent) which is currently running at 3 per cent. 
The Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders said UK car sales in October fell for a seventh consecutive month to 158,192 vehicles, a 12.2 per cent drop from the previous month. Unsurprisingly diesel sales tumbled by one third and business buyers shrank by one quarter. 
DAX 30 
It appears that absolutely nothing can deflect from the Dax’s relentless march into overbought territory, not even yesterday’s announcement by Siemens Gamesa that it will lay off 6000 of its 27000 workforce in order ‘to consolidate its position as a market leader’.

posts.author: dpuser_3508372874
posts.text:
托福线上学习还是可以，不受时间地点的约束。美联立刻说托福还可以，还有专门的真人老师一对一在线学习，效果可以。
我朋友也是在立刻说学英语考过了托福，以前他英语不太好，找专业培训机构学英语，进度的确会快不少，有名师指导，学习方法也不同，少走很多弯路，自学就要摸索，走歪没人提醒，耗费不少时间和精力的。
网络授课突破时空限制，再忙的学员都能将有限的空闲时间利用起来；异地学员也能享受到海外名师授课，这在传统教学中是无法做到的。托福本身就是机考，平时在网络上上课，更有助于提前考试演练，熟悉考试流程。
我是上小班的，主要1对1的课程针对冲刺的，或短期速效型的，我英语还好，所以小班就够用了，比起在其他便宜的机构，立刻说专业可靠多了！推介！！
有试听课可以去感受下： 领取免费试听名额 （注册即可领取两节试听课，还有专家评测英语等级，结果权威，不收取任何费用。如有不实可举报）
每个人基础不同，适应能力不同，上培训班还是要有个体验课的体验过才知道适不适合自己！
老师会面对面帮您测试，根据每个人测试分析，提供针对性英语学习解决方案，再让大家体验外教一对一课程。

posts.title: 파주남광하우스토리 아파트 평면도(1661-8095
posts.text:
수익형부동산오피스텔/호텔/상가 파주남광하우스토리 아파트 평면도(1661-8095 2시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/yyj7565/221134663673 파주남광하우스토리 아파트 평면도(1661-8095)
오늘이 입동이네요
여기 저기 겨울 양식 김장을 준비하려는 바쁜 움직임이 ...
이번주 시골 가서 김장을 하려고 하는데
벌써 허리가 아파오는 기분 ㅎㅎ 엄살이려나?
뽑아서 옮기고 다듬어 절이고 씻고 하는 과정이 정말 힘들더라구요
일이 서툴러 그런가 ㅎㅎ
입동이 지나면 어쨋든 마음이 바빠지는 주부님들
화이팅입니다.
파주 남광하우스토리가 자리가게 될 곳은 도시개발사업이 이뤄지는 곳으로 지역주택조합 아파트지만
좀 더 수월하고 안전하게 주변시세보다 낮은 가격으로 집을 장만할 수 있는 장점과
주변 개발 호재들로 프리미엄 가치를 품고 있는 곳이라 유난히 발길이 많은 지역주택조합아파트이기도 하다는 전언입니다.
주변 개발호재와 함게 수변문화월드 등의 다양한 편의시설들이
파주를 새롭운 주거의 품격을 높여주는 장치가 되기도 하며,
주변 아파트의 가치 상승에 한 몫을 ...
이러한 다양한 시설들에 품격에 어울리는 아파트로 파주 남광하우스토리가 함께합니다.
파주 남광하우스토리를 책임공사할 시공사에 대한 이해를 먼저 하는것도 중요하겠죠!
파주에 대한 다양한 정보들을 어느정도 접하고 아시고 계실거 같아서
파주남광하우스토리 아파트에 대한 이야기로 채워볼까 합니다.
내가 살고 머물며 일상을 꿈꾸고 가꿔야 할 아파트는
어떻게 꾸며질까 궁금하시죠?
파주남광하우스토리 아파트의 평면도입니다.
59㎡-2스타일,77㎡-2스타일,111㎡-2스타일로 구성되어 있습니다.
어떤 스타일을 원하시는지 체크해보시는것도 좋을 듯 싶네요.
파주 남광하우스토리 아파트는 모든 타입이 4BAY판상형 구조로 선호도가 높은 타입으로만 구성되어 있습니다.
따라서, 원하는 평수와 방향에 따른 선호도에 따라 빠르게 소진될 수 있다는것 잊지마세요.
파주남광하우스토리 아파트 111 ㎡B타입의 평면도를 한 번 봐주세요.
위의 평면도와 다른 점을 발견하셨나요?
파주아파트 중 유일하게 내가 거주하면서 월세를 받을 수 있는 111 ㎡B타입은
2세대가 거주할 수 있도록 하여 인기가 꽤 높다는 사실
미운우리새끼의 이상민이 4분의 1 주택과도 같은 방식으로 현관이 분리되어 있어
좋은 거주와 투자를 한번에 할 수 있는 새로운주거형태입니다.
지역주택조합아파트로써의 위험율을 배제한
믿고 낮은 가격으로 집을 장만할 수 있는 기회를 파주 남광하우스토리로...
파주 아파트시세를 가늠할 척도가 될
새로운 주거명작 파주남광하우스토리
분양홍보관 방문을 원하시면 꼭 방문예약을 먼저 주셔야 한다는거 잊지마세요.
환절기 감기조심하시고
11월의 멋진 어느날 기분 좋은
파주남광하우스토리에서 뵙기를 바랍니다.

thread.title: Zacks: Brokerages Expect Ooma, Inc. (OOMA) Will Announce Quarterly Sales of $27.97 Million
thread.title_full: Zacks: Brokerages Expect Ooma, Inc. (OOMA) Will Announce Quarterly Sales of $27.97 Million

posts.author: Patrick Bannon
posts.title: Zacks: Brokerages Expect Ooma, Inc. (OOMA) Will Announce Quarterly Sales of $27.97 Million
posts.text:
Tweet 
Wall Street analysts expect Ooma, Inc. (NYSE:OOMA) to announce sales of $27.97 million for the current fiscal quarter, according to Zacks Investment Research . Three analysts have made estimates for Ooma’s earnings, with the lowest sales estimate coming in at $27.82 million and the highest estimate coming in at $28.04 million. Ooma reported sales of $27.01 million in the same quarter last year, which indicates a positive year-over-year growth rate of 3.6%. The firm is scheduled to announce its next earnings results on Tuesday, December 5th. 
On average, analysts expect that Ooma will report full year sales of $27.97 million for the current fiscal year, with estimates ranging from $113.00 million to $113.10 million. For the next financial year, analysts anticipate that the company will post sales of $120.93 million per share, with estimates ranging from $116.30 million to $126.00 million. Zacks’ sales averages are an average based on a survey of sell-side research firms that that provide coverage for Ooma. 
Ooma (NYSE:OOMA) last issued its earnings results on Thursday, August 24th. The technology company reported ($0.20) EPS for the quarter, missing the Zacks’ consensus estimate of ($0.04) by ($0.16). The company had revenue of $28.20 million during the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $27.72 million. Ooma had a negative return on equity of 30.96% and a negative net margin of 11.48%. Ooma’s revenue was up 11.9% on a year-over-year basis. During the same quarter in the prior year, the company earned ($0.05) earnings per share. 
A number of equities analysts have commented on OOMA shares. Northland Securities set a $11.00 target price on shares of Ooma and gave the stock a “buy” rating in a research note on Friday, July 28th. B. Riley reaffirmed a “buy” rating and issued a $13.00 price target on shares of Ooma in a research report on Saturday, August 26th. Two research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, two have issued a hold rating and two have issued a buy rating to the company’s stock. Ooma currently has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of $11.92. 
Ooma ( NYSE:OOMA ) opened at $9.50 on Tuesday. Ooma has a one year low of $7.30 and a one year high of $12.30. 
In related news, VP James A. Gustke sold 7,200 shares of the stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, October 2nd. The shares were sold at an average price of $10.35, for a total transaction of $74,520.00. Following the completion of the sale, the vice president now owns 182,174 shares of the company’s stock, valued at $1,885,500.90. The transaction was disclosed in a filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at this hyperlink . Also, VP James A. Gustke sold 5,000 shares of the stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, September 18th. The shares were sold at an average price of $9.81, for a total transaction of $49,050.00. Following the sale, the vice president now directly owns 196,333 shares of the company’s stock, valued at approximately $1,926,026.73. The disclosure for this sale can be found here . Insiders sold a total of 66,371 shares of company stock valued at $671,551 in the last ninety days. Corporate insiders own 11.42% of the company’s stock. 
Large investors have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Renaissance Technologies LLC lifted its position in Ooma by 112.2% during the first quarter. Renaissance Technologies LLC now owns 780,000 shares of the technology company’s stock valued at $7,761,000 after acquiring an additional 412,500 shares during the last quarter. Morgan Stanley lifted its position in Ooma by 345.8% during the first quarter. Morgan Stanley now owns 108,751 shares of the technology company’s stock valued at $1,082,000 after acquiring an additional 84,354 shares during the last quarter. Geode Capital Management LLC lifted its position in Ooma by 118.5% during the first quarter. Geode Capital Management LLC now owns 105,441 shares of the technology company’s stock valued at $1,049,000 after acquiring an additional 57,184 shares during the last quarter. PDT Partners LLC purchased a new stake in Ooma during the second quarter valued at approximately $421,000. Finally, Ameriprise Financial Inc. lifted its position in Ooma by 7.6% during the second quarter. Ameriprise Financial Inc. now owns 1,459,000 shares of the technology company’s stock valued at $11,672,000 after acquiring an additional 103,000 shares during the last quarter. 73.31% of the stock is owned by institutional investors. thread.title: Dreamforce 2017 – Why Quip user 21st Century Fox isn’t giving up Slack
thread.title_full: Dreamforce 2017 – Why Quip user 21st Century Fox isn’t giving up Slack

posts.author: Phil Wainewright
posts.title: Dreamforce 2017 – Why Quip user 21st Century Fox isn’t giving up Slack
posts.text:
0 Comments 
Cloud behemoth Salesforce is making a big play for the enterprise collaboration market at this week’s Dreamforce 2017 conference. It’s significantly beefing up its Quip collaborative document platform, acquired last year and led by Facebook alumnus Bret Taylor. One of Quip’s showcase customers is media and entertainment giant 21st Century Fox, who will be appearing on the keynote stage this week to talk about its use of Quip as a collaboration platform. But Quip isn’t the only collaboration tool in use at Fox. In a breakout session Monday, EVP & CIO John Herbert admitted that Slack is an equally important part of its collaboration stack. 
We use Slack as our communication hub. [For] ongoing collaboration, Slack is definitely at the center of it. 
It’s really when the document comes into play when we leverage Quip. We actually feel like they’re a great complement. What we’re getting out of Slack is actually a very different experience than what we’re delivering with Quip. So we do see a world in which they would coexist and we don’t plan on changing that strategy going forward. Document collaboration 
Quip is a mobile-first collaborative document platform that combines elements of documents, spreadsheets, apps, chat and live CRM data. Enhancements announced this week include the ability to embed custom functionality directly within Quip. Called Live Apps, examples include a shared calendar, updating Salesforce records or managing project tasks in a Kanban board. Functionality from third party apps can also be embedded using an API, with a first wave of partners including Atlassian, DocuSign, LucidChart and New Relic. At the same time, Salesforce is strengthening native integration of Quip documents into Salesforce records, Chatter feeds and groups. 
For all its document functionality, however, Quip isn’t a Microsoft Office killer. Co-presenting in today’s session, Fumbi Chima, who is EVP & CIO of Global Fox Networks Group, said that Quip won’t be replacing the Microsoft Office 365 suite of document editing applications at Fox. 
I think Excel will always have a place. I think what Quip does is provide us with that surface level. 
I don’t think we’re trying to say we’re going to get rid of Office365. But in terms of collaboration, from a presentation perspective, I find the likes of numbers, for example, recorded in Quip a lot more easy to use. Quip at 21st Century Fox 
So what is Quip’s role? Its strength is in providing a home for collaboration that revolves around documents or a set of connected tasks. At Fox, that can not only be an Excel spreadsheet, it can also be a collection of stills and video as part of planning the roll-out of a new production. It’s much more effective than trying to communicate using emails and attachments, says Herbert: 
I think if you can step back from the macro level, what Quip is really solving for us is the intersect of collaboration and communication with documents. One of the documents that we really focus on, like any large enterprise, is Excel. I don’t see Excel going away. What we’re seeing though is, spreadsheets are being pulled into Quip. And then you’re wrapping a narrative around it. 
So whether you’re wrapping a narrative around a spreadsheet or if you’re wrapping a narrative around an image, or a piece of video content, it’s all about how do you bring the collaboration into the document, so that it’s all together. 
It then really explains how you significantly eliminate email, because that’s what email was trying to do with attachments. But there was always a disconnect between the narrative and the attachment, especially if it was a complicated one. An alternative to email 
Providing an alternative to email-centric collaboration has made Quip a popular tool at Fox and adoption has been very strong, says Herbert. 
I’m shocked how well embraced it’s been across the enterprise … Once they get on it, there’s no turning back. It’s an easy sell to roll it out when you tell people they can have less meetings and less email. 
This is actually a business problem we’re solving, which is how do we really help deliver a solution around collaboration. There’s such a pain point when you’re dealing with global organizations. We’re really looking for a solution that enables a process that will really pull the organization together. It’s been a great solution that’s going to serve that need. 
Tools like Quip are an important addition to the CIO’s armory in helping organizations transform their culture to be more responsive and fast-moving, says Fumbi: 
When you have tools like Quip, that actually forces people to work together, real-time, quickly, collaborating more instantaneously than we have always done. That changes the dynamic of things. Embedding content and function 
The ability to embed content within Quip has been a popular feature at Fox, which has had early access to the Live Apps functionality. Embedding Salesforce functionality will be the next step, says Herbert. 
I think what really has been a game changer for us is the fact that you can bring content in, both video and still, and have that creative experience. Because they don’t want to just work on the narrative side, they actually want their creative content in itself, and be able to collaborate on that. 
Where we want to take it, we’ve got many of our divisions are heavy Salesforce users, where we can tie in a lot of the activity that we’ve already built out on the business application side and be able to integrate that into Quip as well. 
One practical example is in planning roll outs of a new movie, which Fox manages at a global level. Having calendaring within Quip will be helpful when co-ordinating the timing of a release across dozens of markets. It’s another example of having somewhere to focus and collaborate around a shared goal, says Herbert. 
So we’re looking at it on the calendaring side as well as on the overall business side. There’s a lot of business goals that we manage through Salesforce, and to be able to bring that information out dynamically into Quip. Everybody’s always looking for the narrative that goes along with the data. That’s the goal of why we want the integration. My take 
It’s not a surprise to learn that 21st Century Fox has built a collaboration stack on the twin pillars of Slack and Quip. In the battle for dominance of enterprise collaboration, messaging and content have reached an uneasy truce. Both play a part in the collaborative canvas required to channel effective digital teamwork . 
I like Herbert’s analogy of building a narrative around documents and data as a way of expressing the role of enterprise collaboration platforms. Vendors are trying to find the right structure that can act as an effective container for that narrative, but without constricting it. 
The new features announced for Quip this week considerably advance the platform’s contribution to that collaborative infrastructure. It’s important to embed functionality as headless applications into the flow of work rather than force users to jump between multiple application screens. Slack uses chatbot functionality to achieve a similar effect. 
In some workflows, a messaging platform is enough. In many others, a document framework makes more sense, and for those scenarios, Quip has become a much stronger contender as a result of this week’s announcements. 
Image credit - via the author 
Disclosure - Salesforce is a diginomica premier partner at time of writing.

thread.title: Harvey Weinstein avait embauché une « armée d’espions » pour éviter d’être pris
thread.title_full: Harvey Weinstein avait embauché une « armée d’espions » pour éviter d’être pris

posts.title: Harvey Weinstein avait embauché une « armée d’espions » pour éviter d’être pris
posts.text:
Harvey Weinstein œuvrait depuis l’automne 2016 pour étouffer les révélations sur ses abus sexuels présumés. C’est ce qu’a affirmé le New Yorker , lundi 6 novembre, en détaillant les moyens colossaux utilisés à cet effet par le producteur américain. Selon l’article, il a employé ni plus ni moins une « armée d’espions » pour empêcher , en vain, l’éclatement du scandale qui secoue Hollywood depuis un mois. Lire aussi :   Cinéma : la chute d’Harvey Weinstein 
D’après le New Yorker, M. Weinstein a eu recours à des journalistes de la presse à scandale, voire à des agents secrets d’ entreprises comme Kroll, l’une des plus grandes société s de renseignement au monde , ou Black Cube, firme essentiellement composée d’anciens agents du Mossad ou d’autres agences israéliennes de renseignement. L’hebdomadaire cite des dizaines de documents et sept personnes directement impliquées dans les efforts du producteur déchu.
Une ancienne agente israélienne L’article détaille ainsi le rôle d’une ancienne agente israélienne, employée de la société Black Cube, dont le contrat prévoyait au moins 200 000 dollars (172 000 euros) d’honoraires. Elle avait contacté l’actrice Rose McGowan, l’une des principales accusatrices de M. Weinstein, en prétendant être une militante pour les droits des femmes. En secret, elle a enregistré des heures de conversations avec l’actrice, qui s’apprête à publier ses mémoires, The Brave , un livre qui inquiétait déjà le producteur américain depuis des mois.
Pour discréditer les accusations de Rose McGowan, la société Kroll a par ailleurs envoyé à M. Weinstein onze photos où l’actrice et le producteur apparaissaient ensemble à l’occasion de différents événements, des années après son agression présumée.
Lire aussi :   Harcèlement sexuel : la parole se libère 
Sous une autre fausse identité, la collaboratrice de Black Cube qui s’était renseignée sur M me McGowan a par ailleurs contacté des journalistes enquêtant sur les agressions sexuelles présumées de M. Weinstein, notamment un reporter du magazine New York , Ben Wallace, pour connaître les informations dont ils disposaient.
Mais Harvey Weinstein et son équipe ont aussi enquêté sur les reporters eux-mêmes, y compris sur leur vie personnelle et sexuelle, leurs précédentes enquêtes et potentiels litiges, pour tenter de les contredire , de les discréditer ou de les intimider . Son équipe d’espions a notamment rassemblé des éléments sur l’ex-femme de M. Wallace.
Avocats et presse à scandale impliqués L’article affirme que M. Weinstein, aujourd’hui visé par des enquêtes policières à Londres, New York et Los Angeles, « surveillait personnellement les progrès de ces investigations » . Certaines étaient orchestrées par ses avocats. Parmi eux, David Boies, notamment célèbre pour avoir défendu Al Gore lors du litige sur le scrutin présidentiel de 2000 et pour avoir plaidé en faveur du mariage gay devant la Cour suprême des Etats-Unis.
M. Boies aurait personnellement signé le contrat mandatant Black Cube pour essayer d’empêcher la publication d’une information du New York Times sur les abus sexuels de M. Weinstein. Pourtant, le cabinet de David Boies – qui nie tout conflit d’intérêts – défend par ailleurs le Times dans un procès pour diffamation.
Lire aussi :   L’affaire Weinstein ou les légionnaires du déshonneur 
Enfin, le New Yorker affirme que M. Weinstein a obtenu des informations auprès de journalistes de la presse à scandale. C’est le cas de Dylan Howard, directeur des contenus d’American Media Inc., qui publie le magazine de ragots National Enquirer . L’un des journalistes du National Enquirer a notamment appelé l’ex-femme d’un réalisateur ayant eu une relation amoureuse avec Rose McGowan, Roberto Rodriguez, pour lui soutirer des commentaires négatifs sur la comédienne.
Intimidations La porte-parole de M. Weinstein, Sallie Hofmeister, a évoqué une « conspiration » et elle a déclaré au New Yorker : « C’est une fiction de suggérer que des personnes aient pu être visées ou aient fait l’objet d’efforts d’intimidation. » 
La célèbre avocate de célébrités Blair Berk, qui fait partie de l’équipe légale de M. Weinstein, a décrit ces méthodes comme ordinaires. « Tout avocat de la défense au pénal qui se respecte enquêterait sur des allégations non prouvées pour savoir si elles sont crédibles. » 
Lire aussi :   Affaires Weinstein : la liste des victimes s’allonge, plusieurs enquêtes sont ouvertes 
Ronan Farrow – le fils de Mia Farrow et Woody Allen –, l’auteur de l’article du New Yorker et journaliste à l’origine des révélations, précise en effet que ces pratiques sont courantes chez M. Weinstein : depuis des années déjà, il utilisait des détectives pour enquêter sur les journalistes qui écrivaient des articles critiques envers lui.
Mais, dans le cas des accusations d’agressions sexuelles, M. Weinstein est allé plus loin. Le New Yorker écrit que certains de ses anciens employés ont été recrutés sous le prétexte de faire des recherches pour un livre sur « les belles années de Miramax » , la maison de production cofondée par M. Weinstein et son frère Bob. En réalité, ils ont été utilisés pour rassembler des listes d’ex-employés et d’actrices, pour les contacter , et pour les intimider.
